about_the_game:
Tank Maniacs soundtrack by Men Named Holger. This DLC includes all the songs in MP3 format.

Tracklist:

01 - Tank Maniacs Main Theme
02 - Post-Apocalyptic Dance Party
03 - Wheel Breakers
04 - Let The Mayhem Begin!
05 - Nuclear Blast
06 - Matryo-SKA
07 - They See Me Rollin', They Shootin'
08 - Cyborg Strategies
09 - Don't Funk With My Tank
10 - Good Times, Tank Times
11 - Box Race In Your Face
12 - Ceasefire
13 - Garage Missiles
14 - Close Encounters
15 - War Cars Leave Skars
16 - Death Valley Riders Inc.
17 - Armageddon!
18 - The Winner Roasts Them All
19 - There's Nothing Like Sweet Revenge

name: Tank Maniacs OST
short_description: The soundtrack of Tank Maniacs! Tank Maniacs is a couch party game with tanks for all those people out there who likes couches AND tanks!
